modName: Dear Robbaz - A New Friend - Pluto
summary: A tiny Dwemer Spider that follows and helps you fight.
descriptionHtml:
========================================================
EPICLOLLIPOP MADE THIS MOD!!!

HE IS MY COUSIN\'S ACCOUNT - HIS ACCOUNT IS EPIC LOLLIPOP - 
=========================================================
It puts a little Dwemer Spider in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun who becomes your best friend.

Special Thanks to Varence for the inspiration.
==========================================================
author: Brak
